invocations.description: Returns true if can cast the spell, false otherwise. Checks if the requirements are met and the cooldown for the spell is 0. If target is given then it'll check if it's possible to cast the spell on the creature.

Returns true if can cast the spell, false otherwise. Checks if the requirements are met and the cooldown for the spell is 0. If target is given then it'll check if it's possible to cast the spell on the creature.
